attributes.action: Ensure that Ali Dizaei is sacked from his senior police role (following personal spending on a force credit card), and to ensure that officers are promoted based on credentials, not race or the fact that they cry 'discrimination'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ali Dizaei has, after his controversial promotion been found to have used the force credit card for personal purchases.  A number of other officers who did the same thing have been sacked - there is no reason why Mr. Dizael should be treated differently from these fellows and therefore should be sacked.

David Blunkett personally intervened to drop other investigations against Mr Dizaei.  This should be investigated via a public body to ensure that these investigations were dropped with good reason.

It is not sufficient for someone to get promoted just because they cry racism at each and every opportunity.  Promotion should be based on ability, not race.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
